name: Eyeboy: Abaddon's Delight
description:
Eyeboy: Abaddon's Delight is a short, narrative-driven visual novel created as a followup to A Night With Eyeboy. It follows Eyeboy, Newt, Mush, and Aya as they head to a trivia night at a mysterious bar called Abaddon's Delight. This demo is estimated to be around 70% complete, and doubles as a proof of concept.

There's a mash-up of art styles for the various characters while I try to nail down which one I want to go with, so please understand.

Content warnings: nicotine, death, animal death
